Articles.Content:
Hello,

i was wondering if there is any mod for an Remote Tech Remote (nice and Fancy name right?).

I am verry osessed with remote tech but there is thome thing i was wondering abut. When i wanted to explore eve i dont want to send a kerbal down because of the hard return. So i send a remote rover at the surface.

Now it would be great if my Kerbals at an orbital station can control the Rover without any remote tech conection to Kerbol?

I hope you can understand me, i am not a native speaker.
Yes, you can do that with remote tech. A craft with kerbals can act as local control for anything in range instead of having to send the signal back home.

Yes, put 6 Kerbals and the largest probe core on a ship, and it will act as a Command Station (like Mission Control). You'll get a red dot, and you can control anything that connects to it, even if you have no connection to Mission Control. It doesn't work for science, though.

http://remotetechnologiesgroup.github.io/RemoteTech/#command-stations
